full_summary:
# Automotive Residual Price Information Search Program
## Solicitation Number: W8486-249204/A

### Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for an on-line Automotive Residual Price Information Search (APRIS) Program. The selected contractor will provide instant access to up-to-date vehicle residual values.

### Requirements
See ANNEX “A” STATEMENT OF WORK in the Request For Proposal (RFP) for details.

### Contract Details
The contract is expected to start on October 25, 2023, and end on March 29, 2024.

### Tender Status
This tender opportunity has expired.

### Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contact Information
Valérie Rivet, Contracting Authority

Email: [valerie.rivet@forces.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.rivet@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (000) 000-0000
Fax: (000) 000-0000
Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Tender Documents
The tender documents for this solicitation are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Submission Instructions
Proposals must be submitted electronically via e-mail to:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

Note: This tender has expired and is no longer active.

This last part should be formulated as a "withdrawn" notice:
**Withdrawn Notice:**
The tender opportunity number W8486-249204/A for the Automotive Residual Price Information Search Program has been withdrawn due to the tender status being expired. Any questions or concerns regarding this opportunity should be directed to the Contracting Authority at valerie.rivet@forces.gc.ca. [END]
